    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Merciful Charm](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1523)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 80</row>

**Price** 9 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You Strike with the affixed weapon

**Requirement** You're trained in the affixed weapon.
</row>

</column>

---

This small limestone pendant is typically carved in the shape of clasped hands. When activated, the affixed weapon gains the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) trait for the triggering attack and all other attacks for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Merciful Charm
requirement: You're trained in the affixed weapon.
